sys_data_source.name: Lansweeper Peripheral - Scanner
sys_data_source.sql_statement: SELECT tblAssets.AssetID , tblAssets.Assettype , tblSystemEnclosure.SMBIOSAssetTag AS AssetTag -- No Mapping , 'Hardware' AS Category , tAssetComments.Comment AS Comments , (SELECT ParentAssetID FROM tblAssetRelations -- TODO: may need to check this WHERE ChildAssetID = tblAssets.AssetID AND tblAssetRelations.Type = (SELECT RelationTypeId FROM tsysAssetRelationTypes WHERE Name = 'Connected To')) AS Computer , CAST(tblAssets.AssetID AS VARCHAR) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(tblAssets.Mac)), '') AS CorrelationID , 'Lansweeper' AS DiscoverySource , tblAssets.Firstseen AS FirstDiscovered , tblAssets.FQDN AS FQDN , 1 AS InstallStatus , tblAssets.IPAddress AS IPAddress , tblAssets.Lastseen AS MostRecentDiscovery , tblAssets.Mac AS MACAddress , tblAssetCustom.Manufacturer AS Manufacturer , tblAssetCustom.Model AS ModelID , tblAssetCustom.Model AS ModelNumber , 'Scanner' + ':' + tblAssets.AssetName + ':' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY tblAssets.ASsetName ORDER BY tblAssets.ASsetName) AS VARCHAR(4)) AS [Name] , tblState.Statename AS OperationalStatus , tblAssetCustom.PurchaseDate AS Purchased , tblAssetCustom.Serialnumber AS SerialNumber , tblAssets.Description AS ShortDescription , 'Peripheral' AS Subcategory , atype.AssetTypename AS Type , tblAssets.Domain AS Domain , tblAssetCustom.Warrantydate AS WarrantyExpiration , 'Peripheral' AS SourceName FROM tblAssets INNER JOIN tsysAssetTypes atype ON tblAssets.Assettype = atype.AssetType LEFT OUTER JOIN tblAssetCustom ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblAssetCustom.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tblSystemEnclosure On tblAssets.AssetID = tblSystemEnclosure.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tblState ON tblState.State = tblAssetCustom.State LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetID , MAX(Added) AS Added , MAX(Comment) AS Comment FROM tblAssetComments GROUP BY AssetId )tAssetComments ON tAssetComments.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID WHERE tblAssets.AssetType = (SELECT AssetType FROM tsysASsetTypes WHERE AssetTypeName = 'Scanner')
